gmdescription.label: Description
gmdescription.value:
@UUID[JournalEntry.Qn1nkhIjC38ky3uu]{Da Shiny Moon Tribe} use the following traps in and around their mines, both to catch food and to kill intruders.

  • Deadfall – A @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-salzenmund.items.Item.iu3KhZAlMVZj7cWQ]{net} or rocks ([[/r 1d10+3]] damage) fall from above. This trap may be spotted before it is triggered on a Challenging (+0) Perception Test. Once the Deadfall has been sprung, it can be avoided by making a Difficult (–10) Dodge Test.

  • Spiky Pit – A hole opens up, a yard deep and lined with spikes. A victim falling in suffers [[/r 1d10+6]] damage. This trap may be spotted before it is triggered on a Difficult (–10) Perception Test. Once the Pit has been stumbled into, injury can be avoided by making a Difficult (–10) Athletics Test.

  • Snare – The victim gains the @Condition[Prone] and @Condition[Entangled] Conditions. The Snare counts as Strength 25. This trap may be spotted before it is triggered on a Very Hard (–30) Perception Test.
